content: under the sea star www craftkitten com original pattern by jennifer reeve mmmmaaaatttteeeerrrriiiiaaaallllssss 1 ball filatura di crosa brilla 120 yds/110m 58% rayon 42% cotton dk weight held double on an h 5mm hook any yarn can be used you will need a hook 1 or 2 sizes smaller than gauge recommended on yarn label the larger the gauge & hook the larger your sea star polyfil or stuffing of your choice aaaabbbbbbbbrrrreeeevvvviiiiaaaattttiiiioooonnnnssss sssscccc2222ttttoooogggg= insert hook as indicated bbbbooooddddyyyy yo draw loop through 2 times yo make magic_ring as follows hold end of yarn in loop twist twice insert draw through all loops hook in loop chain 1 round 1 work 7sc into ring tighten ring by pulling on end of yarn 7sc rrrrnnnndddd 2222 marking first stitch of this and every following round work 2 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 14sc rrrrnnnndddd 3333 1 single_crochet in next single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet repeat around 21sc rrrrnnnndddd 4444 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet 1 single_crochet in each of the next 2 single_crochet repeat around 28sc rrrrnnnndddd 5555 1 single_crochet in each of the next 2 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet 1 single_crochet in each of the next 3 single_crochet repeat to last single_crochet 1 single_crochet in last single_crochet 35sc rrrrnnnndddd 6666 &&&& 7777 work even 33335555sssscccc rrrrnnnndddd 8888 1 single_crochet in each of the next 2 single_crochet decrease 1 single_crochet in each of the next 3 single_crochet repeat to last single_crochet 1 single_crochet in last single_crochet 28sc rrrrnnnndddd 9999 decrease 1 single_crochet in each of the next 2 single_crochet repeat around 21sc ssssttttuuuuffffffff wwwwiiiitttthhhh ddddeeeessssiiiirrrreeeedddd ffffiiiilllllllliiiinnnngggg rrrrnnnndddd 11110000 1 single_crochet in each of the next single_crochet decrease 1 single_crochet in each of the next single_crochet repeat to last 2 single_crochet 1 single_crochet decrease over last 2 single_crochet 14sc rrrrnnnndddd 11111111 decrease repeat around 7sc ffffaaaasssstttteeeennnn ooooffffffff aaaarrrrmmmmssss mmmmaaaakkkkeeee 5555 make magic_ring as follows hold end of yarn in loop twist twice insert hook in loop chain 1 round 1 work 5sc into ring tighten ring by pulling on end of yarn 5sc rrrrnnnndddd 2222 work even 5555sssscccc rrrrnnnndddd 3333 marking first stitch of this and every following round work 2 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 10sc rrrrnnnndddd 4444 work even 11110000sssscccc rrrrnnnndddd 5555 1 single_crochet in next single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet repeat around 15sc rrrrnnnndddd 6666 work even 11115555sssscccc rrrrnnnndddd 7777 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet 1 single_crochet in each of the next 2 single_crochet repeat around 20sc rrrrnnnndddd 8888 work even 22220000sssscccc ffffaaaasssstttteeeennnn ooooffffffff aaaasssssssseeeemmmmbbbbllllyyyy with chibi/darning needle and yarn sew arms to body in desired position before finishing stuff arms with fill- ing do not make them perfect real starfish are not perfect with contrasting color yarn sew mouth on bottom if desired © craft kitten 2006 all rights reserved do not copy or distribute without permission sale of finished items is prohibited www
